eya ape pramukhathwaya labena karyabharayayi," yanuwenda ohu pawasiya.nawa wada balana janadhipathiwaraya, senasurada bandhanagarayen nidahas kerunu yukrenaye hitapu agamathini yuliya thimoshenko ge samipa aadharakaruwek.asuwakata wadi pirisak mara damamin kiyef aganuwara mathadi hatagath gatumwalata balayen paha kerunu janadhipathi wikthar yanukowich saha ohuge samipa aadharakaruwan wagakiwayuthu bawata ohugema pakshaya me athara chodana kota thibe.janadhipathiwaraya aganuwarin pala gos sitina athara, aganuwara ghathana sambandhayen jyeshta baladharin ath adanguwata ganime warenthu nikuth kerina.

rupa madhya kshethraye dijital thakshana awakashaya pulul kirima wenuwen mema wasaredi thindu thirana rasak ganna bawa janamadhya amathyansha lekam aacharya charitha herath mahatha pawasayi.rupawahini madhya jala ha sambandha wemin apage rupawahini madhya sandaha dijital thakshanaya wadi wadiyen bhawitha kirimata awashya rajya madihathwima sidukarana lesata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha niyoga kara athayida herath mahatha prakasha keleya.ee anuwa dijital thakshanaya merata rupawahini sandaha upayogi kara ganima wenuwen thindu thirana rasak mema wasaredi ganna bawa da herath mahatha sandahan keleya.merata chithrapata prakshepanaya sandahada dijital thakshanaya danatamath yoda ganna athara nawa lokayata awasi wenaskam wenuwen awashya rajya madihath wima sidu kirimata aadunwa sama mohothakama sudanam bawada herath mahatha pawasiya.aacharya charitha herath mahatha me bawa sandahan kele shri lanka puwathpath mandalaya yatathe diploma hadaru pirisakata sahathika pirinamima wenuwen rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwedi pereda (26) pawathi uthsawayakata sahabhagi wemini.ehidi wadiduratath adahas dakwu charitha herath mahatha meseda kiweya.
